tree.name: Cam Spencer
tree.tradeDescription: 4-team trade: MEM sent Ulrich Chomche to TOR and 2030 2nd to MIN; DET sent Cam Spencer to MEM; MIN sent Klintman and Wendell Moore Jr. to DET
tree.note: UConn guard, acquired from Detroit in 4-team trade

assetsGivenUp.note: Memphis' own 2030 second-round pick, sent to Minnesota
